snippet.title: Serpent Showdown | NEW Student Game Trailer Reveal | #USCGamesEXPO 2020
snippet.description:
Serpent Showdown will be featured at USC Games 2020 Expo on May 12th!

Two tails enter, one tail leaves. You and a friend go head-to-head. It is time to don your … cardboard armor and grab your trusty crayon? And guess what, it turns out you’re a snake. Strike, slither and slash your way to victory in this entertaining couch-competitive arena fighter.

Learn more about Serpent Showdown here: https://www.twitch.tv/serpentshowdown

Check out our trailer & demo our game at USC Games Expo 2020 on May 12th!

Website: http://persuasiongamestudio.com/
Facebook: https://facebook.com/serpentshowdown
Twitter: https://twitter.com/serpentshowdown
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/serpentshowdown
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/serpentshowdown 

RSVP for USC Games Expo 2020!
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/usc-games-expo-2020-tickets-101822142770

✦✦

Visit us on our other socials!
▶Twitter: @uscgames 
▶Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/uscgames/
▶Instagram: @usc.games
▶Our Website: games.usc.edu

✦✦

ABOUT USC GAMES:
Recognized as the #1 game design program in North America by the Princeton Review, USC Games represents an exciting collaboration between the School of Cinematic Arts’ Interactive Media & Games Division and the Viterbi School of Engineering’s Department of Computer Science. Incorporating elements of design, artistry, and engineering, USC Games offers an utterly unique educational experience for students and serves as the launching pad for them to play significant roles in the game design field. 
https://games.usc.edu
